name: Heuristic evaluation template with spider chart
description:
Heuristic evaluation is a process where experts use rules of thumb to measure the usability of user interfaces in independent walkthroughs and report issues. In this template, I have used the established heuristics from the NN group to reveal insights that help design teams enhance product usability from early in the development.


This template can also be used to evaluate the usability of an existing product in order to make it better.


Thumbnail art credits: Teamwork vector created by redgreystock - www.freepik.com
